article: One day, the wind starts an argument with the sun. "I'm much  _  than you are!" says the wind. "No." answers the sun, "I'm much stronger than you are!" While they are arguing, they see a man walking down the road. He is wearing a heavy  _  . The sun says to the wind "Now let  _  see which of us can make the man take off his coat, then we will know  _  is stronger. " First the  _  tries. It begins to blow very hard. It blows so hard that the man pulls his coat round him. The wind is  _  with the man. Then the wind says to the sun, "Now it's your  _  . Let me see if you can make him take off his coat "The sun  _  to shine on the man. Soon it gets very hot! The man  takes off  his coat. The argument is  _  .
